name: Runnin' Goonie
desc: A running goonie from Yoshi's Island. It quickly runs along the ground.

name: Flyin' Goonie
desc: A flying goonie from Yoshi's Island. It starts by gliding for a time, and then flaps its wings, ascending slowly upward. It can be ridden on, in which case it will slowly ascend and not glide at all.
